alert.note: Alert for Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 21 at 5:10AM AKST until January 22 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues to be possible. * WHERE...The following area, central inner channels. This includes the cities of Petersburg, Wrangell, And Kake. * WHEN...Through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, other low-lying areas and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage areas and extensive street flooding are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rainfall totals of 3 inches are possible with freezing level rising to 4000 feet. Periods of heaviest rainfall will be from early Saturday morning through Saturday afternoon. Flows in rivers may increase quickly and reach impactful levels.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop. Persons living along streams should stay alert and be prepared to take action if a warning or advisory is issued, or flooding is observed.

area.areaDesc: Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island
